channel.title: My armor set
channel.description:
allright lets see how much flame i get for this i made these out of quite a lot of different models not all were runescape models and i edited them a lot but idk here they are [IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/armor11.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/bghjjy.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/fttyfty.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i804.photobucket.com/albums/yy327/thugnit1019/kghiuy.jpg[/img] CREDITS-- 50% to jagex for making some of these model 40% to everyone else who made the other models if you want your name in here tell me what model you made and i will post it with credits to you 10% to me for editing and animating the models
i need a name for the red armor anyone got any good ones??

item.title: My armor set
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“R A R E S, post:47, topic:363811”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=460054.msg3375054#msg3375054 date=1287534011]

Skiller is actually good at modeling, R A R E S. Look at his assault rifle, I dont think 3DS Max is anything close to recoloring.

The assault rifle is like the only thing. did you see the server he made? everything was recolored! He sits here and wines like a baby about people recoloring and in reality most of his work is recoloring. Note he also calls it “his” work when he recolors items.
[/quote]Have you ever looked at ANYTHING he made? Sure, he can be a prick sometimes, but that doesn’t take away from the fact he IS a good modeler.

I’d like to see you make something better than a recolor.

Gonna be totally honest right now. I don’t even know how to recolor things, But its mean to sit there and pick on this person for trying. I have seen the server he made and that is an excellent example of recoloring.[/quote]

I’m pretty sure your retarded, if you saw, I (ONLY) called the models I made mine, I don’t mind fricken recolored santa hats because they lighten up the server, and with the recolored vesta’s that was sort of like an armor to show rank or order in heirachy, yes I got mad but it does piss me off, yes THE SERVER IS SHIT, and that’s why I released it, I had a way better server, but sadly I didn’t back it up, now this is the models section, and not the server section so just fuck off…

h1 sk1ller doesn't recolor, he just flames immensely and is an example of why Moparscape gets a bad reputation. Seriously dude, you need to chill out. I think he needs "post approval" thing every time he posts. Every topic he hates ends up with a flame war and an attempt to control him.

Yeah, I’m sorry for flipping out this morning, it just really angers me that he deserve’s/wants to be appreciated and thought at as a good modeler for (making) what? Everyone great had to make something (not literally) it could be making an empire? Or something, but nothing good comes from re-creation other than the fun of it, so doubt me or not but recoloring nothing comes with it except flame, hatrid, and self indulgence because they think they can ‘re-create’ and change the color of something. I don’t mean to flame, it just pisses me off that people steal this stuff, and then call it there’s, I also don’t mean to give Moparscape a bad reputation, and yes after most threads that do get a flame war I usually do end up getting the ‘moderation approval’ put on me, I just sometimes wish that people would stop posting recolors, is that ok? After all anyone is allowed to have an ‘Opinion’ right?

Read full topic

[/quote]
FINALLY, somebody who thinks like me. I was beginning to think I was the only one thinking this.[/quote]I think everyone thinks this tbh, just you’re the only one who publicly expresses it

Oh yea, how’s blender 2.54b? I haven’t had a chance to use it yet.

item.description:
@R_A_R_E_S wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:54, topic:363811”]What do you mean by “inside”?

But yea, I know what you mean, but saying skiller’s models aren’t very far from a recolor when he can’t even model himself isn’t exactly correct. H1 has made plenty of good models, and I’m just trying to prove a point before he flips out on R A R E S xS[/quote]

item.title: My armor set
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

rip4d:

By “good model” I meant knowing the wireframe, coloration, etc. Anyone can tell if something looks nice or not.

Agreed. People look nice on the outside. But you probably don’t want to see the inside…

Read full topic
